website_summaries.verdict: Affordable, breathable jersey with rear pockets, front zipper, available in 3 bright colors.
pros: Breathable, polyester elastic mesh fabric is moisture-wicking and quick-drying
Deep 7-inch pockets in back, plus one with a zipper, to conveniently carry and store necessities
Elastic hem with rubber waist grippers prevents jersey from sliding up
Low price for a cycling jersey
cons: Some complained about sizes running small and a few instances of seams coming loose

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, nice quality and great price
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'11"/190lbs, and the fit on the XL is perfect. My large cell phone fits horizontally in middle back pocket too. This is great quality and design for the price, I immediately bought a couple more.
customer_reviews.author: Rob D

customer_reviews.title: Order one size up and you will be happy.
customer_reviews.text: First things first, this jersey runs very small, Asian sizing for sure. I'm 5'9 and 230 pounds and fit into the 3XL, in most shirts I'm a 2xl or even XL depending on the cut. So now that I'm over the fact that I'm having to wear clothing that says 3xl I am very happy with the jersey. I ride primary at dusk and dawn and the visibility is awesome. For the money the value is there. I have now owned it 3 weeks, it's been washed 10 times. I just purchased the blue one.
customer_reviews.author: Brad G

customer_reviews.title: Great value.  Solid shirt, zippered pocket is a big plus
customer_reviews.text: Shirt has great ventilation on warm humid southern days and is decently warm on cooler days. I carry my keys, wallet, and cellphone so the idea of just putting them in on of those regular pouches on the back of my short DOES NOT appeal to me. The zippered pocket is large enough to hold a regular sized iPhone. At 6'2" and 205 lbs, the XL is slightly loose, which I prefer. Liked it enough I bought a second in another color.
customer_reviews.author: Brian H.

customer_reviews.title: Club (loose) fit, high quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice jersey for less than 20 bucks. Build quality is excellent. The fit is true to size but it's a loose Club fit. More like a regular t-shirt. I'm 5'11 178 and ordered a medium. It fits exactly like the fit on the model. Slightly loose in the midsection and sleeves. I have a bit of a beer belly too. If I weighed my normal 172 a small would probably be a better fit. The material/weave seems a little different than most cycling jerseys. It's not as smooth/silky feeling. Looser weave I think. Have to give 5 stars based on quality and price.
customer_reviews.author: djp616

customer_reviews.title: Dimensions Seem Off For Small
customer_reviews.text: The neck size was too big for a small though maybe mine was incorrectly made. The sleeve openings were too wide for a biking shirt. In my opinion it could be a little tighter for the type of activity it was designed for. The fabric was alright. If you're not picky it will probably be fine. I ended up retuning it after finding something else that fit better. Small Measurements: Neck 18" Chest 41" Hem 37" Sleeve Length 17" Sleeve Opening 14" Front Length 20.5" (due to big neck) Back Length 27.5"
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I would give this 5 stars except they initially sent me the wrong color and size. Amazon's return policy made it easy to return and exchange. The replacement was correct. Great shirt. Size recommendations are accurate, Feels great, looks great, fits right. I normally wear a size 2XL shirt. I ordered this shirt in 3XL. I liked it enough to order another one in a different color. Hopefully, the next one will be what I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Meh - get what you pay for here.
customer_reviews.text: Got the XXL - the elastic waist band is too tight.. i'll probably have to cut it. It fits/feels cheap. I bought a Fox one in the same purchase and gave it 5 stars easily after comparing these two.
customer_reviews.author: James Slack

customer_reviews.title: Good product, overpriced like all cycling clothing
customer_reviews.text: Get larger size. I had to order 3X; I usually wear 2X in men's wear. It's a good product, very good in fact, but it's overprices as all cycling wear is. I don't see how they get away with these prices without some smart entrepreneur capturing a large share of the market by underpricing. I don't understand why this thin shirt should be so expensive. Are synthetic materials so expensive?
customer_reviews.author: Guthrie McIllhennon

customer_reviews.title: Skip the rest, this is the best !
customer_reviews.text: If you want a full fitting high quality bike jersey, this is the one to get. Wicks perfectly, fits very well, and high quality build. I am 5'10" and 175 lbs. I ordered the Large and XL. I prefer the XL for a normal shirt fit vs. the large for a race fit.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Anzak

customer_reviews.title: Good fitting, breathable biking jersey at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these and after wearing it, bought another one because of the fit and design of the jersey. I like the simple appearance of the jersey, as opposed to price, flashy prints that provide no practical advantage at all. The deep pockets on the back are great for carrying my stuff. Has all the requisites for a great biking jersey at a price that can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Keith C.

customer_reviews.title: Love this jersey for what it is!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6'1" and 205 lbs. I no longer like skin tight biking clothing. I usually wear an XL and in this jersey I ordered a 2XL and like the fit. It's a little loose in the body but the length and waist are perfect. For the money and material it's a great jersey.
customer_reviews.author: T. Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Big Boy Special - Great for Dad Bods
customer_reviews.text: Always struggling with jersey's either right chest size but not long enough to cover my belly or awesome belly coverage but tight chest/arms. This jersey is super comfortable with just enough relax fit for the bigger rider. Bought 3X based on my 48-49 inch chest and fits great, almost loose so sizing is pretty accurate.
customer_reviews.author: BCarl

customer_reviews.title: Problems with stitching around the neck.
customer_reviews.text: 09/17/2020, Purchased this shirt in July of this year. The stitching around the neck is pulling out. Contacted the manufacturer through Amazon to you see if I could get a replacement and I will update this review when the problem is resolved. 10/1/2020, STILL NO RESOLVE OR COMMUNICATION AFTER 2 WEEKS! BEWARE!
customer_reviews.author: CALBEAR

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Riding Option
customer_reviews.text: I see why these cycling shirts are so popular. They are functional and comfortable and I don’t have to ride around on my bike looking like a reject from a Marvel movie with a skin-tight suit on. The pockets work great. I can stash my mini pump and my snacks in them. I’ve got no complaints! Winslowapproved
customer_reviews.author: Wins APRVD

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with this shirt. It took awhile to arrive (It did arrive earlier than scheduled.), but was well worth the wait. It's light-weight and very comfortable and cool, yet well-made. Love the large pocket in back. I didn't want a tight-fitting shirt, so I ordered a size up and it fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Thom

customer_reviews.title: Good, inexpensive cycling shirt.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good shirt, especially for the money. Reflective strips on the shoulders are coming off after 20 wash cycles or so (we do delicate cycle for synthetic gym clothes). Aside from that, it doesn't stain easily. It is comfortable and breathable. I need to buy more than one!
customer_reviews.author: DiscipleofJMB

customer_reviews.title: Nice Men's Shirt For Bike Riding!
customer_reviews.text: This was for my husband. He liked the shirt and was pleased to find all the pockets. One feature I wasn't sure he would like was the elastic band at the waist. Turns out he loved it. Only drawback, and it has nothing to do with the fit or performance, is there isn't any laundering instructions to be found on the shirt. If they were on a tag attached to the shirt, those are long gone.
customer_reviews.author: BLMofMI

customer_reviews.title: Great shirt for cycling
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this cycling shirt. It stays relatively cool, which is important in the Texas heat. He also likes the pocket in the back that can hold daily essentials (keys, ID, etc). The color choices are also nice.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea R. Zabcik

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: Fit was spot on to the chart reference. The quality of the garment was great for the cost of the shirt. I previously bought Spotti shirt for the same price and the quality is not comparable. Great comfort and the sticky band at hem of shirt keeps it in place during your ride. Definitely will buy again. Don’t spend more money on expensive shirts till you try this one .
customer_reviews.author: Victor C.

customer_reviews.title: features and quality at a vg price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tailoring, not tight or floppy, with snug three rear pockets and sticky wide elastic that keeps it in place at one's hips. Got the neon yellow for extra assurance to be seen by motorists. Time will tell how it looks after laundering.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Beland

customer_reviews.title: This looks to be a nice quality shirt.
customer_reviews.text: This looks to be a nice quality shirt. The description said they ran a bit small, and to order one size up if you want a looser fit. I normally wear a XL, so I ordered a XXL. It fits, but kind of snug. If you really want a loose fit, I would order two sizes larger. I figure in my case it's a motivator to lose weight. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Jonas

customer_reviews.title: Finally, true to size cycling jersey
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a different brand, ordered a 2XL, arrived listed on the package as Asian 2XL, US L. Tried one more, knowing it was made in China, and the size is as advertised. Rear pockets are great. Zippers are high quality. Nicely made and great value.
customer_reviews.author: ccspir2

customer_reviews.title: Great Biking Shirt
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes the pockets in back to carry all the necessary things and I like that it is bright so it is hard for drivers to miss seeing him on the road! Ordering a second one! Zippered pocket is great to secure carry on.
customer_reviews.author: phoenix Blue

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfortable & Breathable
customer_reviews.text: High-quality breathable material and construction make this a great value. It fits as pictured not too tight around the torso. If you want a skin-tight jersey this isn't it, but if you want something comfortable and breathable to keep you cool on a sunny ride you would be happy to have this jersey. I would buy this again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Just about to buy 2 more.....
customer_reviews.text: But my wife pointed out that after 5 rides the side pockets have holes in them. Makes me really sad cause it’s hard for a big guy like me to find jersey’s that fit and are comfortable. I did a total of 78 miles in this jersey and it developed holes. Sad :(
customer_reviews.author: Allie B

customer_reviews.title: Functional and stylish bike jersey
customer_reviews.text: Great warm weather cycling jersey. Three pockets in back, including one with a zipper enclosure for valuables. I’m 6’ and weigh 180, and it fit me well. Holding up well over a dozen or more wash cycles. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: James A. Cahill

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: This item is just as pictured and it is a perfect fit! All the pockets in the back will accommodate the needed small items for a 12 mile (24 round trip) straight terrain bike (bicycle) trip:)
customer_reviews.author: PrayfortheshalomofJerusalem

customer_reviews.title: Actually fits like American sizing for me
customer_reviews.text: Medium fit me fine. I'm male, 5 10", 155 lbs and usually wear medium shirts in the US. The medium here is actually slightly long and a little loose, but not so much that its a problem. This seems like a really good shirt and a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew S.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I am new to cycling so I needed to buy so gear...I grabbed two of these and they are holding up good so far...they feel great on the ride...size fits as expected...I am a large and they fit super good. Great buy for the price
customer_reviews.author: Harold A

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value; buy a size larger.
customer_reviews.text: It is everything it says in information. Size runs a little small compared to shirt size. Goes perfectly with my $700 bicycl. If you want best craftsmanship, buy vest at specialty shop for 4-5X more.
customer_reviews.author: RHD, Auburn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shirt and economical. I could carry my mobile phone, keys and 4 350ml bottles of gatorade comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Judgement

customer_reviews.title: BIG GUY REVIEW. Nice fit and quality
customer_reviews.text: Im 6'4" and about 285. Wear size 42 jeans and in a shirt usually go for 52. The shirt is just tight enough to remind me WHY i'm exercising on the bike. Quality is great and you cant beat the price. Will be buying a few more.
customer_reviews.author: S. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, durable and lower cost than most
customer_reviews.text: I like these Koraman cycling jerseys because the sleeves are snug enough, but don't end in tight fitting elastic like others. So, they don't ride up on your arms. Well made and comfortable. I have two.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Gillespie

customer_reviews.title: Nice Jersey
customer_reviews.text: I prefer a more loose fitting/casual jersey to ride in. These jerseys fit the bill and are super cost effective. Wound up buying 3 in total...
customer_reviews.author: S. ORourke

customer_reviews.title: Great biking shirt
customer_reviews.text: Great shirt, great price, been through the wash multiple times still looks like new. Liked it so much, I bought another in different color. It's also a really good biking shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Kayell

customer_reviews.title: Nice comfortable shirt
customer_reviews.text: It is a good comfortable shirt, but because of the recent heat, I haven't had the opportunity to wear it much. I will have to see how it holds up in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: George Grote

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Cyclist Short
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'9", 260 pound and XL fits nice, I like the material it keep me ventilated, Highly Recommended specially for cyclist enthusiast like myself. Four Rear pockets, one with zipper "Nice". What are you waiting for, please buy one or two.
customer_reviews.author: Yamir-Stuff

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Shirt
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking for! Size and material is perfect just too bad I didn't order another for my wife! You will not be disappointed in this.
customer_reviews.author: jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Lets go biking
customer_reviews.text: I got this shirt for my husband so he can bike to work and have a place to put his phone and wallet. He likes it. It's loose enough as he likes it and fits him well.
customer_reviews.author: LeahV

customer_reviews.title: Great, comfortable Jersey's!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these jerseys. They are comfortable and I love all the pockets. The zipper pocket is nice so I can put my ID and debit card incase I need some food or something.
customer_reviews.author: Jbone80

customer_reviews.title: Not skin tight!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing price for a quality jersey. The xxxl is not skin tight. An XL t-shirt is on me. I bought two. Have cold washed, air dry 5 times so far. Still like new.
customer_reviews.author: R. Lager

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: Picked up two of these products in hopes that they would fit and be comfortable and they lived up to the expectations. I am 6ft 230lbs and purchased the 3Xl because of my stomach size. They are long enough to cover my belly I may even have been able to get a size smaller but I am satisfied. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Good jersey for the money
customer_reviews.text: It's comfortable and the rear pockets hold my phone, wallet and gels. Fit is typical asian sizing, I usually wear a large and wear a 2XL in this. Been through several machine washes and still looks like new. I received nothing for this review.
customer_reviews.author: John D. Faneuff Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Fits well with wallet, iPhone in back pockets.
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered a second one I like this one so much.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Schaefer

customer_reviews.title: Great bike jersey
customer_reviews.text: I’m very picky about my shirts and I was worried that I would not find a bike jersey that I would wear. I’ve tried about 20 different brands and this is the first that I’ve been able to tolerate. The price is great and the quality seems really good but I’ll find out as I wear it. I sized up as I don’t like anything tight as a shirt. Normally I would get xxl but I went with 3xl and it’s perfect (loose).
customer_reviews.author: angellayne

customer_reviews.title: Received Incorrect Size?
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 2XL and the bag I received was labeled as such, but the tag on the shirt read 'L' and there is some fraying around a few seam stitches. The material and zippers all seem great, so I was very disappointed in the size discrepancy (if indeed it is accurately sized as the packaging noted).
customer_reviews.author: Jason C.

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably Priced Cycle Jersey if you can sew.
customer_reviews.text: Nice Jersey! Moved from 5 stars to 1 star. Both corners of back pockers have holes where the seams have come undone after wearing 4 times. Thought I found a bargain but not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Allan Wenninger

customer_reviews.title: Good deal on inexpensive jersey
customer_reviews.text: Low price is great, good material, good fit for riding, not super form fitting, but not baggy or flappy either, comfortable fabric washes well, I like that one jersey pocket zips shut.
customer_reviews.author: Paul M.

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go wrong with this jersey!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this jersey for cycling. Great price, quality, fit comfort and overall value. Money well spent! I love this jersey!!
customer_reviews.author: gd58

customer_reviews.title: Practical, washes easily, good visibility
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband who is a beginner biker. It's been very useful and practical for the summer. Fits loosely compared to fitted bike shirts you see on the trails. He likes it though.
customer_reviews.author: connie scott

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and stylish. My only issue is that the material smells after a lot of sweating but I don’t think that is the products fault.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Fits big men
customer_reviews.text: Good value for money - AMERICAN sizing. 3xl fits the way a 3xl should if you were shopping at an American shop.
customer_reviews.author: Rev. Rick

customer_reviews.title: An inexpensive cycling jersey for stocky guys!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect Jersey for big husky guys too! The jersey is comfortable around the entire body. Not too tight or lose!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Consorte

customer_reviews.title: Great jersey at a price that cannot be beat!
customer_reviews.text: Well made, reflective jersey in vibrant blue. A very low-cost addition to my cycling attire. It has 3 pockets including a zippered compartment in the back. Designed to be longer in back than in front - perfect for bicycling, and wicks perspiration well.
customer_reviews.author: N. Graf

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two more after wearing initial shirt. There is elastic around bottom of shirt to keep it in place, and it’s generous length. Three pockets across back, center w zipper closer. Overall, good value for money
customer_reviews.author: OrlandoTom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect !
customer_reviews.text: One of the best cycling shirt out there in my opinion. Zippered pocket is perfect. If you are short the pockets may be down too low if you are ordering larger sizes. Other than that, it’s awesome !
customer_reviews.author: UGADawg

customer_reviews.title: Fabric Ran
customer_reviews.text: The red ran all over the white tee shirt underneath. Cheap fabric.
customer_reviews.author: nygal

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $
customer_reviews.text: With no reviews I figured I would take a chance for 20 bucks and I am glad I did! Very cumfy and appears to be decent quality. The only issue I can find is the threading around the elastic waist seems to break easily. Found you just have to be careful putting it on or taking it off.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Fit was great!
customer_reviews.text: It fit very well. A prior order of a different brand was way to tight.
customer_reviews.author: mj

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable bike jersey
customer_reviews.text: Nice jersey, no defects. The color bled a bit the first time I washed it. The zipper pulls could be bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: They say what you pay is what you get. After wearing the jersey twice. stitching of one of the pockets already came apart. Plus the jersey it doesn't even have laundering instruction. I'd rather save money for better jersey than this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Hyun Park

customer_reviews.title: Good jersey worth more than the price.
customer_reviews.text: Fits good , looks good. Versatile for carrying stuff , zipper pocket. Worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Lilyea

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Fit as advertised, well made, nice pockets and comfy, fit for a bike jersey. Bought two in different colors and really enjoy them.
customer_reviews.author: discountmopar

customer_reviews.title: Great value for "regular" riding
customer_reviews.text: Didn't realize how great this was until I bought a Pearl Izumi jersey on clearance for about the same price that didn't fit as well, wasn't long enough in back, and didn't grip as well around the waist. I have 2 and will probably get a 3rd. Trim, but not a race fit.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: brought 3- ride with it every other day...... and clean and rotate....... excellent price and product
customer_reviews.author: keith c.

customer_reviews.title: The fit and the zipper in back. Quality made.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. The fit is great. I sized it large for me, as I dont like tight clothing. I am 6'3" and 250 lbs. I purchased a 3xl. I plan on buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Got this one and another brand. Like both but this is my favorite. Fits loose but not so much that the pockets are baggie in the back.
customer_reviews.author: simpdawg

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: Little small based on the size. On the other hand, it’s a bike jersey.
customer_reviews.author: SecSauceMan

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price. Just as nice as some of the name brand jerseys I’ve owned in the past.. I’ll never spend big $ for a Jersey again.
customer_reviews.author: Destin Danser

customer_reviews.title: Order 1 size larger than you normally wear.
customer_reviews.text: You do need to order this 1 size larger than you normally wear but it is a very comfortable cycling jersey.
customer_reviews.author: Cory Roberts

customer_reviews.title: A must have for the serious biker.
customer_reviews.text: An excellent biking shirt of good length, great quality and nice zipper pocket for slim wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Naaman E Torres

customer_reviews.title: Cool and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable material and great at wicking moisture. It felt true to size and I was actually surprised by the material and construction. I would definitely purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Nice jersey
customer_reviews.text: Small issue with the stitching on the back side but it really didn't effect anything with the fit. I had been looking for a jersey for quite a while since I am a bigger guy it has been difficult, so this one works well may actually buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Esseltine

customer_reviews.title: Well made, good fit!
customer_reviews.text: I am a relatively new biker and this is the 1st shirt I have Purchased. It appears to be very well made and fits nicely. I have nothing negative to say or anything imply, would buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I'm a Clydesdale...6'1'' 250 - 50 chest and this shirt works. I really like the three deep pockets and the zipper pockets for my credentials. Appears nicely made.
customer_reviews.author: AES442

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice cycling jersey that fits well
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice cycling jersey that fits well. It seems to be durable and is comfortable to wear on hot days. I will buy more of them.
customer_reviews.author: DWG

customer_reviews.title: Size runs very small. Typical Euro/Asian sizing.
customer_reviews.text: When I see XXXL my thoughts are something for a man of 250 LBS and around 6 FT or more. Apparently that's just not the case with some companies. XXXL means someone 5 FT and 175 LBS. Ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony H.

customer_reviews.title: Good well made shirt for big guy
customer_reviews.text: Good well made shirt for big guy. Good pockets in back and anti slip lining on bottom. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: jjeff

customer_reviews.title: Measure and check size chart!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and comfortable. Go by the size chart NOT the size you usually wear. Definitely measure yourself for an accurate fit.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great jersey for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a jersey that didn't make me feel like I was stuffed into a sausage casing. This fits true to size and is definitely not too tight.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Simon

customer_reviews.title: Great Safety Item!
customer_reviews.text: Great Product! Very visible Day or night. Also comfortable. Quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: re212ssa

customer_reviews.title: SUPER BUY AT A MUCH LOWER COST THAN COMPETITORS
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cycling jersey. For some reason, cycling jerseys from major brands and other outlets are ridiculously expensive. This product is a super buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth E. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: What a shirt
customer_reviews.text: Not cray about the elastic band around the waste. Otherwise fine
customer_reviews.author: Jane B.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this jersey
customer_reviews.text: A little tight but i have worn this jersey during several rides and am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great jersey
customer_reviews.text: Nice, practical jersey. Works well on warm climate. I like the zipped pouch on the back, I place my IDs in there and fear not of them getting lost
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits well and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy to wear on hot days, snugs up[ well at the waist and breathes well.
customer_reviews.author: ET

customer_reviews.title: Good to go
customer_reviews.text: Good to go, better than expected quality, materials, and features. Will get another and I do recommend for sure. 6'1", 260#,40" waist
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: good jersey
customer_reviews.text: fits well but the back is a little shorter and slide above waste line sometimes than other jersey's I've bought from amazon. Still a good jersey for the price
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Pattman

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price. If you need multiple jerseys for frequent consecutive rides or if you want matching jerseys for a group these are economical.
customer_reviews.author: jcolemanhayes

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: i like the fabric its a tad tight if you have any upper body
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, great fit!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband. The sizing is generous and not snug. He found it very comfortable and loves it. I will be purchasing it again in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Towanna Brossard

customer_reviews.title: I'll be seen to ride another day.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very satisfied re all categories save craftsmanship, only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Charles G

customer_reviews.title: Has a rubberized band at the waste that helps to keep the shirt snug to the ...
customer_reviews.text: Shirt fits as expected . Has a rubberized band at the waste that helps to keep the shirt snug to the waist. Washes up nicely too.
customer_reviews.author: Nutshell

customer_reviews.title: Good shirt for the price
customer_reviews.text: Like this shirt a lot (ordered 2 more) and a big selling point is that these shirts have a zipper pocket that my phone id and some cash with no worries of them falling out
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband so he can be more easily seen while biking. It fits him perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like this shirt a lot for mountain biking Has a lot of storage

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits great, but the seam where the pockets were came undone after 5th time wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Drager

customer_reviews.title: Fit runs small, so get one size up
customer_reviews.text: They fit fine (I wear a L so I got an XL), the materials are not the best, but for the price, that's Okay
customer_reviews.author: Richard Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Excellent riding gear
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it! So much so he reordered more!
customer_reviews.author: Kirsty Smith

customer_reviews.title: Form meets function
customer_reviews.text: For my first riding shirt it is very comfortable. Back pockets are great for my phone, sunglasses and gu when riding.
customer_reviews.author: Robert W Higgins III

product_meta.title: KORAMAN Men's Reflective Short Sleeve Cycling Jersey with Zipper Pocket Quick-Dry Breathable Biking Shirt
feature_bullets: NOTE: The size is snug fit, please choose 1 size up if a loose-fit is needed.(Promotion: coupon for padded cycling shorts, paste "B07HFX9Z6X" in Amazon search box to find the shorts to get discount)
*ALWAYS KEEP COOL* Moisture-wicking quick-dry breathable elastic mesh fabric.
*VENTILATION and REFLECTIVE* Durable half vislon zipper(10") for better ventilation. Reflective logos around the bike jersey keep you visible in the low-light environment.
*BIG REAR POCKETS* 3 big(6") and deep(7") enough elastic rear pockets with an extra zip pocket for convenient and safe storage
*RUBBER WAISTBAND* Elastic hem with rubber waist grippers preventing sliding up
*BUY with CONFIDENCE* We want you to buy in confidence. If thers is any problem, return free or 100% money back.
